Creating Classes

  • what is a class?
  • behavior (actions) and attributes
  • initialize
  • instance variables
  • attrreader, attrwriter, attr_accessor
  • private methods
  • require_relative
class Task
  attr_reader   :title, :description
  attr_accessor :status
  
  def initialize(title, description, status)
    @title       = title
    @description = description
    @status      = status
  end

  def complete!
    complete = "Completed"
  end
end
